vote.title: Authorize a five-year service contract in the amount of $2,424,581.01, with four one-year renewal options in a total amount of $2,380,355.82, as detailed in the fiscal information section, for continued licenses, maintenance, hosting, and support for the existing integrated library system - Innovative Interfaces, Inc., sole source - Not to exceed $4,804,936.83 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a five-year service contract in the amount of $2,424,581.01, with four one-year renewal options in a total amount of $2,380,355.82, as detailed in the fiscal information section, for continued licenses, maintenance, hosting, and support for the existing integrated library system - Innovative Interfaces, Inc., sole source - Not to exceed $4,804,936.83 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
